ai-patthana16.30:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.30:1.1_0: For it does not arise because of applied and sustained thought, without placing the mind and keeping it connected there are no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.30:1.1_2: that’s not the fifteenth day sabbath.
ai-patthana16.30:2.1_0: without placing the mind and keeping it connected are without placing the mind, but without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-patthana16.30:2.1_1: (The ninety-two grounds for) a single object,
